title: Pakistan Advertising Association delegation meets PIO
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 16 (APP): A delegation of Pakistan Advertising Association (PAA) on Friday called on Principal Information Officer (PIO) of Press Information Department Dr. Tariq Mehmood Khan here.
Besides PAA President Jawad Humayun, the delegation comprised executive members Nadeem Akbar, Tariq Mehmood, Shabbir Malik, Khadim Hussain and Ahmed Ali, said a press release.
The delegation thanked the PIO for implementing the “Classified Advertisement Policy”.
In the meeting, the issues related to payment of outstanding dues were also discussed.
Dr. Tariq Mehmood assured the delegation that the issue of payments would be resolved soon.
During the meeting, the PAA delegation also presented an official “Letter of Thanks” to Dr. Tariq Mehmood Khan.
